name: RISE
description:
"RISE" / METACHROMATIC SERIES (3/3)
Graphite Pencil on Paper
2550x3500
300dpi
Personal Use Only

Sometimes there will be a time in our life when we are so down by all the circumstances that are beyond our control. When we are on the edge, giving up and feeling so hopeless, not knowing the way out and how to solve all of these.

However, life is like a spinning wheel, full of ups and downs. We need to know that time will heal up all these things. There will never be a moment when every aspect of our life is perfect as we expected. These imperfections that build a solid character.

Rising above these imperfections and working wisely towards our little life journey is what life is all about.
